titleStmt.title: Rosalynde. Euphues golden legacie found after his death in his cell at Silexedra. Bequeathed to Philautus sonnes, noursed vp with their father in England. Fetcht from the Canaries by T.L. Gent.
titleStmt.author: Lodge, Thomas, 1558?-1625.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Abel Ieffes for T. G[ubbin] and Iohn Busbie,

notesStmt.note: Running title reads: Euphues golden legacie.
The source of Shakespeare's "As you like it".
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
